A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a hardcore Star wars fan that has read much of the Legends as well as new Canon books\, played games such as KOTOR 1 & 2\, frequently reads the comics from the franchise\, I absolutely loved this movie. I will immediately state that\, yes\, this isn't the best one from all the movies and it has a few flaws\, but despite that I'd rate it a solid 8.5/10. The movie gets the Star Wars feeling right but also is unique in the sense that it's unlike any of the other movies. And that is a good thing! The Last Jedi took risks and in my opinion they paid off!
